Description:
Enviable Rural Lifestyle Close to the Coast
Contact the listing agent to arrange a private inspection.
Set back from Swan Bay Road in a quiet pocket of rural tranquillity - and just a few minutes drive from spectacular coastal surf beaches - this smart, contemporary home on just over 5 acres offers a truly enviable lifestyle.
As you drive through the solar-powered front security gate, you pass a mature and fully-productive olive grove, a fabulous range of fruit trees, and a careful selection of established trees that have been retained to provide ideal shade around the property.
In traditional Australian style, the homestead sports a north-facing front verandah, a west-facing paved pergola, and a south-facing deck that overlooks a sparkling swimming pool.
Inside, a relaxed lounge offers a delightful bay window with garden views, and a split-system for year-round comfort. The dining area has access to the deck, via a sliding door, and the galley-style kitchen, with its own butlers pantry, provides every amenity for creating fine cuisine. Theres a large Westinghouse electric oven and ceramic cooktop, a Bosch dishwasher, stone bench tops, and loads of cupboard space and built-in shelving. The large deck is an obvious destination for alfresco dining and entertainment. Down a central hall are a laundry, an ultra-modern bathroom, three bedrooms with built-in robes and ceiling fans, and a master bedroom with a walk-through robe, and an ensuite. Electric heating from the slab keeps everything toasty during the cooler months.
The property is divided into 3 paddocks, all with rabbit-proof fencing, and the three sheds all have electric power - plus the large 5-bay Workshop/Machinery shed also has water and two roller doors.
Other features of interest are fixed wireless NBN, a 22,500 litre water tank, a 140 sq.m. chicken run, and a 10 m. long raised veggie bed with mushroom compost. Plus the option of purchasing a 22.5 hp Massey Ferguson Tractor and attachments.
Inspection is highly recommended.

Description:
An Irresistible Lifestyle
Offering an impeccable level of craftsmanship and attention to detail. This superior, quality-built family home has unprecedented street appeal. Showcasing tastefully updated interiors, a delightful backyard, and ample secure parking. This stunning two-storey home is sure to impress.
Situated in a quiet court and occupying 909m2 approx. this location will leave you wanting nothing more. Within easy reach of public transport, Ash Road shopping strip, Leopold Kindergarten and Leopold Primary School are close by for young families, along with the Leopold Community Hub and Library. The expansive Gateway Plaza leaves you spoilt for choice with shopping and easy access via the Bellarine Highway to the heart of Geelong or exploring the wineries and coastline of the Bellarine Peninsula.
Offering four generous sized bedrooms, all located upstairs and capture stunning views of the bay water, right through to the You Yangs. The generous main bedroom is graced with a walk-in robe providing ample storage, the dressing room with laundry chute leads to the private ensuite. The three additional bedrooms odder built-in robes and share close access to the main bathroom and separate toilet. Both bathrooms are in spotless condition, while also granting you the choice to refresh with a modern touch.
With plenty of space for the whole family to enjoy, this spacious home consists of three separate living spaces. Located at the front of the home, the formal lounge & dining is bathed in natural light. The open plan living, meals & kitchen zone is the hub of the home and oversee the backyard from this generous living space!
The kitchen exudes timeless elegance with black and white cabinetry and black fittings. Stylish pendant lights highlight the island bench, which showcases a custom Victorian Ash timber waterfall bench top. Quality appliances include built in oven, 900mm stainless steel gas cook top, dishwasher and range hood.
Completing the floorplan inside is the laundry and powder room, along with the versatile study /5th bedroom.
The interiors seamlessly blend original character with contemporary modernizes. Freshly painted walls, new hybrid waterproof flooring, new lighting, new black ceiling fans, and new blinds throughout. Additional features include ducted heating, a split-system air conditioner, solar panels benefiting both the environment and your bank account.
Outdoors features a large alfresco area with built-in umbrella, which is perfect for relaxing on those warm summer days. Surrounded by established cottage gardens and a generous lawn area, the backyard is simply charming. Children will be the envy of all their friends with a playground area with shade sail, which features a sandpit, monkey bars, and swing. The cubby house, rainwater tank, and garden sheds, as well as the remote double lock-up garage leading through to the single carport and large work shed complete the rear yard.
This property will give you the family friendly lifestyle youve been longing for! Dont miss this amazing opportunity!

Description:
Top Shelf Executive Residence!
Boasting a stylish, sleek contemporary flair this 'as new' residence of the highest calibre is sure to turn heads. A classic open plan design showcases expansive window features (double glazed) which frame truly spectacular water views and promote wonderful light filled living zones. This fine property represents a 'top shelf' down size 'or' executive style residence with a 'low maintenance' brief.
Three beautifully appointed bedrooms; master is complete with ensuite with oversized shower recess and walk in robe. The 2 additional bedrooms form a guest wing and are serviced by a stunning family bathroom, complete with a luxurious free standing bath.
A sophisticated kitchen design is nothing short of eye catching, featuring custom cabinetry which provide excellent storage solutions, dual stone bench tops, pendant lighting, and a stainless steel gas cook top all further endorse the uncompromising design brief.
This property possesses a classic open-plan design with an enviable northerly aspect. Crisp white finishes, striking polished timber floors and expansive windows enhance the free flowing living zone and a classic Coonara creates a wonderful ambience. A trio of glass stacker doors create a seamless connection to a hardwood decked alfresco (a glorious space to take in an early coffee and gaze across deep blue water vistas).
This fine residence boasts an impressive inclusions list to be discovered on further inspection. All the modern comforts built with efficient green living in mind and set within a peaceful court location completes the picture.
A double remote controlled garage with internal access
This truly limited and exclusive property offering is sure to be 'hot property' from day 1
The Bellarine Peninsula is a thriving market place; vibrant restaurant and cafe scene, award winning wine labels, beautiful parklands, excellent boating and fishing prospects and the unforgettable panoramic views of the bay and granite peaks of the You Yang's

Description:
Tranquillity on your doorstep!
This wonderfully designed home is a perfect combination of both convenience and luxury. Located on approx. 512m2 offering a spectacular location, overlooking open parkland, while all amenities are just a stone throw away.
This spectacular, single- level residence will exceed all expectations with its outstanding fittings and fixtures throughout. Presenting this immaculate 4-bedroom home, with exquisite attention to detail, no expense has been spared in creating a sense of comfort, whilst ticking all the boxes.
This is a generous and convenient layout for all buyers alike. Offering a large main bedroom with full ensuite, walk in robe and a stunning outlook over the estuary parkland. Comprising two large living areas, stylish and fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, 900mm gas cooktop and large island bench/ breakfast bar. Overlooking the dining and living area and flowing out to the paved firepit area, making it a perfect space for outdoor entertaining. A delightful family bathroom services the three additional bedrooms (all with built in robes).
With a clever floor plan, the home is appointed with an abundance of storage options, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, large double lock-up garage, as well as convenient side vehicle access and low maintenance gardens.
You'll love the family-friendly location close to parks, sporting grounds, public transport, kindergartens and schools. Only a short 3-minute drive to the Gateway Plaza Shopping Centre and easy access to both the Bellarine Peninsula and Geelong CBD. Don't let this be a property you miss out on!

Description:
"Toorang" - Historic Bellarine Peninsula Italianate Homestead
Exceptionally located at the gateway to the Bellarine Peninsula situated 15 minutes Geelong City Centre, 15 minutes Ocean Grove, 20 minutes Queenscliff and 5 minutes to Leopold Plaza shopping. Elevated majestic surrounds delivering a lifestyle of excellence in supremely private tranquillity.
With sealed Melaluka Road frontage, Toorang is introduced via a tree lined driveway leading to the imposing circa 1853 Italianate residence overlooking the iconic Lake Connewarre, an estuary encompassing some 2,200 Acres.Toorang has views to Barwon Heads and Breamlea and is believed to be one of the oldest estates on the Bellarine Peninsula with direct water frontage.
The residence provides formal entry, 3 bedrooms (master ensuite), open plan living, formal sitting room, library and observation tower. In line with country living, a woodfired AGA slow combustion stove, separate gas hotplates and electric oven along with dishwasher complete the main kitchen with delightful water outlook. A separate guest wing which offers living area, kitchen (St.George electric oven) bathroom providing the ideal adjunct to the residence overlooking the salt water IG pool.
Further improvements include double storey self contained coachouse accommodation with 3 bedrooms (all ensuited) kitchen, two multi purpose rooms and a large store room
Externally, Toorang is subdivided into 9 main paddocks (electric fencing) on generally heavy soils with 1 dam. Timber cattle yards (steel crush) all steel hayshed and ancillary shed make this magnificent property an enviable country retreat.
Mains water connected.
A rare offering after 34 years with the same family ownership. A genuine chance for the purchaser to become only the thirteenth owner since 1853.

Description:
Spacious Living, Both Inside and Out!
Set upon approx. 665m2, this property offers spacious family living both inside and out!
The Dorothy Street shops are a short walk from your front door, meaning you dont have to venture far for your daily essentials. The Bellarine Rail Trail is also within easy walking distance, along with public transport and the Cornthwaite Reserve playground. Families are taken great care of with Leopold P.S, Leopold Community Hub, and the Leopold Library just moments away. Easy access to the Gateway Plaza and local sporting grounds adds the final touch to this family-friendly locale.
Its easy to see that this home has been well-loved over the years, with the interiors well kept. The formal lounge and dining room create a wealth of space, while the generous open plan living/dining/kitchen zone provides the lively hub of the home. The kitchen takes care of all your cooking needs with an abundance of storage and appliances (dishwasher, wall oven, 900mm electric cooktop, rangehood).
Zoned to the front of the home, the Master Bedroom boasts a walk-in robe and en suite. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the main bathroom, while the front study is ideal for students and home business owners alike. The laundry with external access and separate toilet complete the generous layout. Youll be in comfort all year long with two gas wall heaters and a split-system air conditioner.
Outside, the alfresco creates a peaceful setting for outdoor living. Leafy trees create a lovely sense of privacy. The backyard gives children plenty of room to run and play, while the gardens are home to a veggie box. The remote single lock-up garage is complete with a workshop.
With the elements in place for great family living, youll need to act swiftly to secure this family abode! Enquire today!

Description:
Impressive Family Living
Here is a home that has it all. Superbly renovated, it has everything for the modern family. Enormous shared living space, multi-functional outdoor entertaining zones, beautifully updated kitchen and bathrooms and an abundance of space throughout the property.
Comprised of;
Three large bedrooms ALL with walk in robes and ceiling fans, the master bedroom also
features a beautifully appointed ensuite
Completely renovated kitchen with breakfast bar, this area also contains the main family
living room and formal dining space
Large undercover BBQ and entertaining area, the north-facing backyard also has a fire-
pit zone, cubby house and large landscaped lawn and gardens
Double garage and further off-street driveway parking
A beautifully designed second living area providing room for quiet time or socialising
Located walking distance to Leopold Primary School, Gateway Sanctuary Nature Playground, restaurants, cafes and local shopping its also less than 20 minutes to Queenscliff, Thirteenth Beach and Central Geelong. A true lifestyle location and a magnificent family home.
At Wilsons we are conscious of playing our part in reducing the spread of COVID-19. We will therefore be conducting our property inspections strictly on a 'one on one' basis and by using best practice sanitary measures to ensure everyone's safety. We can also arrange a virtual tour of the home if that better suits. Contact us today.

Description:
Under offer
This stunning Barrabool sandstone and weatherboard residence (circa 1861) provides a rare opportunity with over 150 years of history, character and individuality to create your own piece of history by further renovating and adding your stamp to this unique residence. Originally built by pioneer Swiss vignerons, this property has historical significance for its associations with the winemaking industry in colonial Victoria, and the breathtaking cellar transports us back in time. Neuchatel covers approximately two acres and is located in the prestigious rolling hills of Barrabool, just a stones throw from the Ceres township where peace and tranquillity is the way of life.
While a new extension would enhance the size, this gorgeous cottage currently comprises three bedrooms with original features. Master bedroom with a deep-set colonial window creates a very special ambience and charm, two childrens bedrooms, a functional family bathroom, a simple and light-filled kitchen that looks out to the yard, separate sitting room and a large north-facing dining and lounge with polished floorboards and fireplaces. French doors open to a verandah and alfresco deck thats ideal for outdoor living and entertaining. A stunning and unique feature of this residence is the 3x6 metre sandstone basement cellar.
Surrounded by a manicured hedged garden and century-old trees, outdoor features include an original coach house and stables, minor sheds, vegetable gardens, childrens play area, original Chasselas grapevine and 50,000 litres of water storage.
With a bus stop to private schools directly outside the property, easy access to Highton Village shops and cafes, Geelong CBD and the Surf Coast, and one hour to Melbourne CBD via the Ring Road, Neuchatel is ideally located to maximise all the benefits of country living, while being close to amenities.
Move in today and soak up the history, or put your own special mark on the property with opportunities to renovate and extend.
For more information on this property text '460 Merrawarp' to 0428 444 841

Description:
Tranquility Plus
Four !! That was a happy golfer at the rear of the property playing on one of the premium golf courses on the Bellarine - this could be you ! If you are wanting to escape the noise of heavy traffic and hear the calling of birds and the rustle of wind in the trees in this tranquil setting 37 Clear Water is the location for your new home. Situated within a couple of minutes walk from a great meal at the Clifton Springs Golf Club followed by a stroll down to the water at the Dell.
The Clifton Springs Golf Club or Bowling Club are at your door step. Cafes and wineries of the Bellarine nearby and 10 minutes to the Portarlington Ferry. The Drysdale town centre is only 5 minutes away with all local amenities.
Blocks of approximately 602m2 block in this location are almost impossible to secure. Call now to speak to the agent.

Description:
STYLISH TOWNHOUSE WITH BAY VIEWS!
Only two on the block and No. 2 is a gem with views and privacy, professionals, investors and first time buyers take note . The open plan area is extra generous, includes dining, living and fabulous kitchen, all opening to the wrap around balcony. Upstairs master bedroom with ensuite and WIR, remaining two downstairs have BIR'S, central bathroom, laundry, powder room on lower level complete the plan. Features bamboo floors, stone benches, dishwasher, pantry, central heating, split system, loads of storage, quality fittings and window furnishings. Light and bright throughout with the garden providing a private space to sit and relax. Extra large double garage and storage room. Style, privacy, nothing to do, architect designed, this is a rare chance to have the lot on the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula .

Description:
Spacious Townhouse in Central Drysdale
Situated on 364m2 in a manicured garden setting. The biggest one on the block inspection is a necessity to appreciate the interior proportions of this established townhouse in the centre of Drysdale. More like a small house than a unit there are features galore with two spacious bedrooms incorporating floor to ceiling wardrobes. The bathroom has oversized shower, bath and toilet - large enough to accommodate wheelchair access. The open plan living - dining kitchen is light, open and large enough to accommodate any family gathering.
Storage galore in the walk-in pantry, floor to ceiling linen press and laundry cupboards. Extra garage space with remote access and bonus second toilet.
Features split system, ceiling fan, dishwasher, second toilet, 1.5 garage, side access carport, front awning and solar panels. Room for vegies in the back yard and a garden shed to boot !
These properties are sought after and snapped up quickly !

Description:
Exceptional Quality in Ideal Location
Located in the much sought-after pocket of Leopold, this immaculate family home is a delight to inspect. Offering a fantastic, adaptable floorplan including an amazing outdoor alfresco entertaining area, this home is sure to suit a multitude of buyers.
Positioned on a fully landscaped and beautifully presented allotment of 648m2 approx., this stunningly presented family home will leave you wanting for nothing.
From the moment you enter the home it will be perfectly evident that the highest attention to detail has been carried out throughout every aspect of this home. Featuring four spacious bedrooms, the main bedroom boasts a private ensuite and a walk-in robe with great storage. All other bedrooms comprise of built in robes and are serviced by a central bathroom and separate toilet.
With three separate living zones, there is no doubt that there is an abundance of space for everyone. Comprising a rumpus room, perfect to utilise a kids playroom, the open plan living area and an additional separate lounge/ study, located at the front of the home an featuring built in bench & cupboards. The well-appointed kitchen defines the central hub of the home and includes a walk-in pantry, 900mm free standing gas cook top & oven and expansive island stone bench overlooking the main living and dining area.
The main living area extends beautifully onto the impressive undercover alfresco. Surrounded by beautiful gardens, shade sails and a ceiling fan for all year-round comfort, it will make indoor, outdoor entertaining a breeze. The rear yard creates a secure play space for children and pets alike. The oversized remote double lock-up garage features internal and rear roller door access for extra car accommodation. The garden shed provides extra storage.
This stunning property features top of the range fixtures and fittings, downlights, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, split system AC, tinted windows & a beautiful street scape.
This location places you footsteps away from reserves and playgrouds. Leopold Primary School and the Leopold Community Hub are within close reach, along with the Gateway Plaza and local sporting grounds. The Portarlington Highway grants easy access to the delights of both Geelong and the Bellarine Peninsula.
This property showcases the superior blend of spacious, convenient, family living and outstanding value for money. An ideal lifestyle is on offer and wont last long, an inspection is a must!

Description:
Faultless location meets charming renovation
For sale by Openn Negotiation (a flexible term online auction). The auction has commenced and the property can sell at any time. Contact Ricky on 0438 307 579 or William on 0488 706 144 immediately to become qualified and avoid missing out.
No matter what type of property you're searching for, whether it's your first home, new family home or an investment property, this newly renovated home will be sure to impress. Set on a generous 640sqm approx. allotment with three generously proportioned bedrooms, master with spacious walk-in robe, ensuite and superior finishes. The open plan kitchen, living and dining area incorporates an abundance of natural sunlight which provides a seamless connection to the outdoors.
- Three spacious bedrooms, master with walk-in robe and ensuite
- Modern and stylish open plan kitchen, living and dining area
- Kitchen with 900mm stainless steel oven and dishwasher
- 7.5kw Split-system air conditioning, oversized ducted central heating
- Spacious and private rear yard, low maintenance living throughout
- Renovation includes new roof with insulation throughout
- New plaster, square set ceilings, floor to ceiling tiles in bathroom
- Frameless shower screens, instant hot water and new fences
- 5 Minutes to Leopold Primary School and local shopping centre
- 15 Minutes to Geelong CBD, Waterfront and Botanical Gardens

Description:
Add Value and Reap the Rewards
Here is a chance to add value to a property that is bursting with potential and reap the rewards of an astute investment.
This brick and tile residence features a sunny kitchen and dining area that adjoins a generous living zone with large windows for abundant natural light, and a gas heater to keep things cosy. There is plentiful storage throughout, including built in robes in the three bedrooms, a large walk in pantry in the kitchen, and an ample linen press and cupboard. It is easy to see that this home could be transformed into something special with a contemporary feel while retaining its charming original features including the character filled solid timber flooring.
The 693m² (approx) allotment offers potential to extend the footprint if required; alternatively, with the existing home well positioned, explore the possible development of the site (all STCA). The north facing rear garden is fenced and a lock up garage provides secure storage and parking.
Located in an established and family friendly area, everything you need is close by. Schools, shops and parks are minutes away and Geelong is less than a twenty minute commute. This home is also ideally placed to make the most of harbour side beaches for boating and fishing; and coastal hotspots are easily accessed too. Land bank for the future, move in and make it your own or capitalise on the potential right now, either way this is an exciting and rare opportunity.

Description:
Private Inspections Available
Easy Living With A North-Facing Yard & Caravan Storage!
Whether youre dreaming of owning your own home, searching for a terrific investment, or on the hunt for the perfect downsizer, this home will be at the top of your list! Featuring a north-facing backyard and secure storage space for a caravan or boat, this home is simply charming!
Public transport is a short stroll away, while a walking path provides direct access to Christies Road. The nearby parkland and playground are within easy walking distance - perfect for children and pets who love to run and play. The Bellarine Rail Trail is within close reach, along with the Leopold Sportsmans Club and Leopold P.S. The Gateway Plaza will leave you spoilt for choice with shopping and dining options. The Portarlington Highway grants easy access to both Geelong and the Bellarine Peninsula.
The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone creates the heart of the home, while opening onto the north-facing alfresco deck and outdoor entertaining area. The sheltered alfresco boasts a ceiling fan and café blind, while the sun-drenched outdoor entertaining area features a retractable awning meaning you can enjoy outdoor living in every season! The kitchen will delight with a walk-in pantry and stainless steel appliances inc. a dishwasher and 900mm oven, gas cooktop, rangehood.
The Master Bedroom overlooks the backyard, with the walk-in robe leading through to the en suite. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to main bathroom, while the separate toilet and laundry with external access complete the layout. Modcons include ducted heating, two split-system air conditioners, and ducted vacuum. Established gardens surround the backyard, which is also home to lush lawn and a garden shed. 3KW of solar panels benefits both the environment and your bank account, while a veggie garden and 2000L rainwater tank promote sustainable living. The remote double lock-up garage features internal access. Dedicated parking for a caravan, boat, or trailer adds the final touch to this fantastic property.
An effortless lifestyle is yours to keep with this Leopold gem! Inspect ASAP!

The home is kept comfortable year round with ducted heating whilst outside enjoys a lovely low maintenance garden, double garage and rear access directly onto the Bellarine Rail Trail! Enjoy walks around Lake Lorne, along the Bellarine Rail trail and much more straight out of your back gate from this sought after location.

Description:
Perfectly Presented Family Home
This 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom family home is ideally positioned close to schools, local shops, skate park and the best playground on the Bellarine ! Not to mention close to the tennis courts and Jetty Road boat ramp and harbour.
Having been tastefully renovated it is ready for you to move straight in and enjoy the lifestyle of the Bellarine Peninsula.
The neutral pallet is perfect to make your own. Two double bedrooms with built in robes and central bathroom at one end of the home, and a good sized master bedroom, with walk through robe and brand new ensuite at the other end.
Positioned on a large 581 m2 block, with a separate double garage with automatic door and garden shed on the side. You also have the added benefit of double gates to be able to access the rear garden and secure a boat or caravan.
Suitable for downsizers, investors or first time buyers, this home hits the spot.
You rarely find a property at this price, in such fantastic condition, on such a great size block.
Arrange a private inspection today.

Description:
Entertainers Delight with Sweeping Bay Views!
Mesmerising sunsets, gentle summer breezes and undulating, uninterrupted Bay Views - this could be the lifestyle change you have been waiting for! Not to be missed, this unique coastal meet country abode offers functional family living all while being situated upon a whopping 796m2 block.
Positioned back from the street offers a sense of added privacy and you're greeted by the manicured, rose lined front garden. Split over 2 levels, the ground floor comprises a grand master retreat with walk-in-robe and en-suite, floor to ceiling windows with Bay and rural views and complete by private sliding door access to the back deck - a true parents oasis! A second bedroom with Bay views and built-in-robes, laundry, separate toilet and access to the back garden complete this level. Float upstairs and you're greeted by a spacious kitchen with gas cooktop, electric oven and stainless-steel dishwasher, while overlooking the light-filled dining and living space, which offers access to the wrap-around balcony. The 3rd bedroom also offers Bay views and a versatile study/4th bedroom both hosts built-in-robes and serviced by the central family bathroom with shower over bath, vanity and toilet. A spacious 2nd living area at the rear offers breathtaking, panoramic Bay views with seamless floor to ceiling windows and flows effortlessly onto the spacious undercover outdoor entertaining area. The back garden offers multiple sitting areas, an open grassed and hours of fun to be had in the above ground pool.
Additional features of the home include: Heating and Cooling, tinted northerly facing windows, 2 x garden sheds, water tank, double carport and additional room for multiple cars, boats, caravans and all toys in between.
Located in an elevated, enviable pocket of Clifton Springs and within walking distance to public transport, the Bay, Golf Club and within proximity to all major amenities, supermarkets and schools, the best of the Bellarine is waiting for you.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Private Inspections Available
A Rare Opportunity to Secure Two Units On One Title!
Presenting two units upon a spacious 842m2 (approx.) block, this is the ultimate investment opportunity! Whether you plan to lease both homes, or to live in one while you lease the other, this is an opening not to be missed. This property also offers an ideal set-up for those with family members who enjoy their independence but still need to be close to the primary caregivers.
Positioned in a quiet pocket of Leopold, this location places you within walking distance to public transport and the Leopold Sportsmans Club. The Highland Milk Bar is also a short stroll away, along with access to the Bellarine Rail Trail. A short drive will place you at the Leopold P.S and Gateway Plaza - putting the practical elements in place for families of all ages!
Set upon such a large block, both units are positioned to maximise privacy. Both floorplans consist of a generous living/dining/kitchen zone, three bedrooms with built-in robes, bathroom, separate toilet, and a laundry with external access. The kitchens take care of all your cooking needs with a built-in pantry and cooking appliances (oven, gas hob, rangehood).
In the front unit, a split-system air conditioner and ceiling fans provide modern comfort. The secure backyard will delight with gorgeous gardens and a veggie/herb patch. The small alfresco features a café blind to protect from the elements - meaning you can enjoy this beautiful outdoor setting all year long. The remote single lock-up garage provides secure parking.
The rear unit features a split-system air conditioner, gas wall heater, and a ceiling fan. The sheltered alfresco puts the foundations in place for casual outdoor living while flowing onto the generous yard. Caravan owners will instantly see the appeal in creating vehicle access to the grassy yard! The remote single lock-up garage provides secure parking.
Rarely does an opening like this arise in the property market! Youll need to act quickly to secure this unique opportunity!
